alternative_parents.description: Organosulfur compounds containing a tosyl group, with the general formula CH3C6H4S(O2)R (R =  any atom).
alternative_parents.name: Tosyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a sulfonamide group that is S-linked to a benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: Benzenesulfonamides

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing a benzenesulfonyl group, which consists of a monocyclic benzene moiety that carries a sulfonyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Benzenesulfonyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organometallic compounds hat containing a metal atom substituted by on or more aryl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Metal aryls

alternative_parents.description: Organometallic compounds containing an aryl group attached to a mercury atom.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl mercury compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing the sulfonyl group, with the general structure RS(=O)2R' ( R,R' must not be H).
alternative_parents.name: Sulfonyls

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a sulfonic acid or derivative, with the general structure RS(=O)2X (R=alkyl, aryl; X=any heteroatom).
alternative_parents.name: Organosulfonic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds that are made up of carbon and hydrogen atoms only.
alternative_parents.name: Aromatic hydrocarbons

alternative_parents.description: Organic salt compounds containing a transition metal atom in its ionic form.
alternative_parents.name: Organic transition metal salts

alternative_parents.description: Hydrocarbons that contains one or more unsaturated carbon atoms. These compounds contain one or more double, triple, or aromatic bonds.
alternative_parents.name: Unsaturated hydrocarbons

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a nitrogen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organonitrogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds with a positive electric charge.
alternative_parents.name: Organic cations

class.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
class.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as sulfanilides. These are organic aromatic compounds containing a sulfanilide moiety, with the general structure RS(=O)(=O)NC1=CC=CC=C1.

direct_parent.description: Organic aromatic compounds containing a sulfanilide moiety, with the general structure RS(=O)(=O)NC1=CC=CC=C1.
direct_parent.name: Sulfanilides

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic aromatic compounds containing a sulfanilide moiety, with the general structure RS(=O)(=O)NC1=CC=CC=C1.
subclass.name: Sulfanilides

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
